title: Just.Cause.HD.REPACK-vol1
description:
Just.Cause.HD.REPACK-vol1

Just Cause (1) with an HD patch ("ureschanger"?). Modify the file named "resolution.ini", if you wish/require a different resolution than 1920x1080 ("full HD"). The installer creates a shortcut to it in the start menu but you can easily find it in the main game folder.

To remove the HD patch, simply delete the files d3d9.dll and resolution.ini.


1. Mount or unpack .iso
2. Install
3. Play
